thread.section_title: Hotel Magenta 38 by HappyCulture - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Mother and daughter long weekend in Paris
thread.title_full: Mother and daughter long weekend in Paris - Review of Hotel Magenta 38 by HappyCulture, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Phoebe G
title: Mother and daughter long weekend in Paris
text: Such a lovely hotel, very conveniently placed after you get your bearings. As we wanted to see as much as we could we weren't really at the hotel much but when we where the staff were very welcoming and the room was perfect for a long weekend. Very well priced aswell the river is about at 20-25 minute walk down a straight beautiful road with tones of things to see along the way.
